com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core

Class CommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tilastokeskus.matertis.core.CommandHandler

  • public class CommandHandler
extends Object
    Works as a collection of game commands bound to different identifiers. Registered commands may be set, unset and executed with the respective id of the command. The commands are meant to be bound to keyCodes defined in the KeyEvent class, but do not have to be.
    Author:
    tilastokeskus

        public static final int COMMAND_NONE

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandHandler

        public CommandHandler(GameHandler gameHandler)
        Constructs a command handler with default commands and mappings. The default mappings are as follows:
        • KeyEvent.VK_LEFT - move tetromino left.
        • KeyEvent.VK_RIGHT - move tetromino right.
        • KeyEvent.VK_DOWN - move tetromino down.
        • KeyEvent.VK_UP - rotate tetromino.
        • KeyEvent.VK_SPACE - drop tetromino.
        • KeyEvent.VK_P - pause game.
        • KeyEvent.VK_R - restart game.
        Parameters:
        gameHandler - Game handler to initialize commands with.

    • Method Detail

      • rebindCommand

        public void rebindCommand(int commandID,
                 int newBinding)
        Changes the binding of some command identifier.
        Parameters:
        commandID - identifier of the command whose binding should be changed.
        newBinding - the binding that the defined command should be bound to.

      • getCommand

        public Command getCommand(int commandID)
        Retrieves the command associated with the given command identifier.
        Parameters:
        commandID - identifier of the command that should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        command that was associated with the given identifier, or null if there was no command associated with the id.

      • getBinding

        public int getBinding(int commandID)
        Retrieves identifier that is currently bound to the given command identifier.
        Parameters:
        commandID - identifier of the command whose binding should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        identifier that is currently bound to the given command identifier, or COMMAND_NONE if nothing is bound to it.

      • getBoundCommand

        public Command getBoundCommand(int binding)
        Retrieves the command associated with the given binding.
        Parameters:
        binding - the current binding to some command.
        Returns:
        command that was associated with the given binding, or null if there was no command bound to the given id.

      • executeCommand

        public boolean executeCommand(int commandID)
        Executes a command with the given id, for example, COMMAND_LEFT.
        Parameters:
        commandID - identifier of the command to be executed.
        Returns:
        true if the register contained a command with the given command identifier, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        Command

      • executeBoundCommand

        public boolean executeBoundCommand(int binding)
        Executes a command bound to some identifier, for example, KeyEvent.VK_LEFT.
        Parameters:
        binding - identifier of the current binding to some command.
        Returns:
        true if the register contained a command with the given identifier, otherwise false.
        See Also:
        Command
